ygData.subject: Re: Hideous rumor...
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes.  That is disturbing.  I have created this character based only on the fact that I would be able to dish out the most damage later on in the game...   If
ygData.messageBody:
Yes. That is disturbing. I have created this character based only on the fact that I would be able to dish out the most damage later on in the game... If this rumor became true.. and my initial assumption turned out to be all for naught.. then I'd end up starting another character.. which I DO NOT want to do...

Drev
